name: Desert Stunt Bike Drive Pro
description:
Now you can drive, drift, race and feel a racing sports bike.
crazy bike traffic racing is a milestone in the genre of endless arcade simulator racing games.
Drive more your bike through city and desert highway to earn cash, upgrade your bike and buy new ones.
Enjoy the cutting edge 3D graphics with realistically created environments and amazingly detailed bikes.
Try to be the fastest drivers.
Pick your favorite bike and join the ultimate challenge!
Now it's time to hit the roads with the most beautiful and stunning bikes.
